content:
Sure, here is the DDL query to create the database schema using MySQL:
```scss
CREATE TABLE Customer (
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  contact_details VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  kyc_details VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Account (
  account_number INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  account_balance DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  account_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (account_number),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transaction (
  transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  account_number INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (account_number) REFERENCES Account(account_number)
);

CREATE TABLE Loan (
  loan_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  repayment_schedule VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (loan_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loan_Type (
  loan_type_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (loan_type_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (loan_id) REFERENCES Loan(loan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Interest_Rate (
  interest_rate_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_id INT NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(4, 2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (interest_rate_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (loan_id) REFERENCES Loan(loan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Credit (
  credit_id INT NOT NULL,
  credit_limit DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  credit_utilization DECIMAL(4, 2) NOT NULL,
  credit_score INT NOT NULL,
  credit_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (credit_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Risk (
  risk_id INT NOT NULL,
  risk_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  risk_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  risk_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (risk_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance (
  compliance_id INT NOT NULL,
  compliance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  compliance_deadline DATE NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (compliance_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Treasury (
  treasury_id INT NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (treasury_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investment (
  investment_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_portfolio DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  treasury_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (investment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (treasury_id) REFERENCES Treasury(treasury_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Cash (
  cash_id INT NOT NULL,
  cash_reserves DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  treasury_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (cash_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (treasury_id) REFERENCES Treasury(treasury_id)
);
```
